cluster_domain.description: The domain name of cohesity user

cluster_vip.description: IP or hostname of Cohesity cluster node

cluster_gateway.description: The default gateway IP address for the cluster network

cluster_name.description: The name of the new Cloud edition cluster

cluster_subnet_mask.description: The subnet mask of the cluster network

dns_servers.description: The DNS servers to configure on the cluster

domain_names.description: The domain names to configure on the cluster

enable_encryption.description:
Specifies whether or not to enable encryption.
				 If encryption is enabled, all data on the cluster will be encrypted

enable_fips_mode.description:
Specifies whether or not to enable FIPS mode.
				 This must be set to true in order to enable FIPS

encryption_keys_rotation_period.description: The rotation period for encryption keys in days

license_key.description: Cohesity license key to apply after cluster creation

node_ips.description: IP addresses of the nodes in the cluster

ntp_servers.description: The NTP servers to configure on the cluster

operation_timeout.description: The time to wait in minutes for cluster creation or destruction

name.description: Specifies the name of the Protection Job

operation_timeout.description:
Specifies the time to wait in minutes for the protection job run
				 to complete the run or stop the run

state.description: Specifies whether to start or stop a protection job run

timestamp.description: Specifies the current timestamp to trigger starting or stopping a job run

delete_snapshots.description:
Specifies if snapshots generated by the Protection
				Job should also be deleted when the Job is deleted.

exclude.description:
Specifies the list of vm's from the protection source
				that should not be protected and are excluded from being
				backed up by the protection job

full_sla.description:
Specifies the number of minutes that a Job Run
				of a Full (no CBT) backup schedule is expected to complete,
				which is known as a Service-Level Agreement (SLA).A SLA
				violation is reported when the run time of a Job Run exceeds
				the SLA time period specified for this backup schedule.

include.description:
Specifies the list of vm's from the
				protection source to be protected by this protection job

incremental_sla.description:
Specifies the number of minutes that a Job Run
				of a CBT-based backup schedule is expected to complete, which
				is known as a Service-Level Agreement (SLA). A SLA violation
				is reported when the run time of a Job Run exceeds the SLA
				time period specified for this backup schedule.

name.description: Specifies the name of the Protection Job

priority.description:
Specifies the priority of execution for a
				Protection Job

qos_type.description:
Specifies the QoS policy type to use for this
				Protection Job. 'BackupHDD' indicates the Cohesity Cluster
				writes data directly to the HDD tier for this Protection Job.
				This is the recommended setting. 'BackupSSD' indicates the
				Cohesity Cluster writes data directly to the SSD tier for this
				Protection Job. Only specify this policy if you need fast ingest
				speed for a small number of Protection Jobs

storage_domain.description:
Specifies the storage domain where this job
				writes data

timezone.description: Specifies the timezone in the format: Area/Location

cluster_gateway.description: The default gateway IP address for the cluster network

cluster_name.description: The name of the new Physical edition cluste

cluster_subnet_mask.description: The subnet mask of the cluster network

dns_servers.description: The DNS servers to configure on the cluster

domain_names.description: The domain names to configure on the cluster

enable_encryption.description:
Specifies whether or not to enable encryption.
				 If encryption is enabled, all data on the cluster will be encrypted

enable_fips_mode.description:
Specifies whether or not to enable FIPS mode.
				 This must be set to true in order to enable FIPS

encryption_keys_rotation_period.description: The rotation period for encryption keys in days

ipmi_gateway.description: The default gateway IP address for the IPMI network

ipmi_subnet_mask.description: The subnet mask for the IPMI network

license_key.description: Cohesity license key to apply after cluster creation

ntp_servers.description: The NTP servers to configure on the cluster

operation_timeout.description: The time to wait in minutes for cluster creation or destruction

virtual_ips.description: The virtauls IPs for the new cluster

backup_timestamp.description:
Specifies the time of the protection job run.
				 Should be in the format YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM Area/Location

job_name.description: Specifies the name of the protection job that backed up the objects to be restored

name.description: Specifies the name of the restore task

operation_timeout.description: The time to wait in minutes for restore task start/stop operation

state.description: Specifies whether to start or stop a restore task

vm_names.description: Specifies the names of the virtual machines to restore

vmware_parameters.description: Specifies vmware parameters for the restore task

active_task_latency.description:
If the latency of a datastore is above this value,
				existing backup tasks using the datastore are throttled.

cap_streams_per_datastore.description:
Specifies whether datastore streams are configured
				for all datastores that are part of the registered entity. If set
				to true, number of streams from Cohesity cluster to the registered
				entity will be limited to the value set for number_of_streams. If
				not set or set to false, there is no max limit for the number of 
				concurrent streams.

enable_latency_throttling.description:
Indicates whether read operations to the datastores,
				which are part of the registered Protection Source, are throttled.

enable_ssl_verification.description: Specifies whether SSL verification should be performed.

endpoint.description:
Specifies the network endpoint of the Protection
				Source where it is reachable. It could be an URL or hostname or
				an IP address of the Protection Source

new_task_latency.description:
If the latency of a datastore is above this value,
				then new backup tasks using the datastore will not be started.

number_of_streams.description:
Specifies the limit on the number of streams
				Cohesity cluster will make concurrently to the datastores
				of the registered entity. This limit is enforced only when the
				cap_streams_per_datastore is set to true

password.description: Specifies password of the username to access the target source

username.description: Specifies username to access the target source

cluster_gateway.description: The default gateway IP address for the cluster network

cluster_name.description: The name of the new Virtual edition cluster

cluster_subnet_mask.description: The subnet mask of the cluster network

dns_servers.description: The DNS servers to configure on the cluster

domain_names.description: The domain names to configure on the cluster

enable_encryption.description:
Specifies whether or not to enable encryption.
				 If encryption is enabled, all data on the cluster will be encrypted

enable_fips_mode.description:
Specifies whether or not to enable FIPS mode.
				 This must be set to true in order to enable FIPS

encryption_keys_rotation_period.description: The rotation period for encryption keys in days

license_key.description: Cohesity license key to apply after cluster creation

node_ips.description: IP addresses of the nodes in the cluster

ntp_servers.description: The NTP servers to configure on the cluster

operation_timeout.description: The time to wait in minutes for cluster creation or destruction

virtual_ips.description: The virtauls IPs for the new cluster
